summary:
itsapinkrubberball
 replied to your post  “love-in-the-time reblogged your video: 20180916 Keystone Con chemistry...”
          ...
body:
itsapinkrubberball replied to your post “love-in-the-time reblogged your video: 20180916 Keystone Con chemistry…”
It’s funny how, at cons, she is always being asked about him and she gushes on, but rarely is he asked about her. But when I got my autograph last year, I told him she was my favorite Beatrice and he said she was his favorite Beatrice, too. :)

I would really love if someone asked David to talk about Catherine at a con. He gets so many “Rose” questions which I have no interest in. And that’s so sweet that she’s his favorite Beatrice. ^_^  I can imagine how much fun they had during that production.

I got an autograph from him back in 2015 and it was a MAAN picture. He said “wow! That’s a blast from the past” and thanked me when I said how much I loved their work together. He also said “I do too!” when I expressed my hope that they’d work together again. (Six months later, Big Finish was announced!)

itsapinkrubberball replied to your post “love-in-the-time reblogged your video: 20180916 Keystone Con chemistry…”
I’ll try to ask about Big Audio, I got a 10th/12th Doctors photo op this weekend. (My wallet hates me).

ohhhh… TOTALLY WORTH IT!!! My wallet hated me after this week’s con, but in the end, I’d rather have a happy memory than a regret due to something like money.  I hope you get to talk to him a little bit during the photo op. AND HAVE FUN!!!

itsapinkrubberball replied to your post “itsapinkrubberball replied to your post “itsapinkrubberball replied…”
I think she said “Was I?” but I don’t remember because I soon melted into a pool of awkwardness and down a metaphorical drainpipe. But I’m so glad she’s doing cons and it looks like she’s going to keep doing them!

She’s completely adorable. And it is a joy that she’s still doing cons. I know she must be prepping for her New Zealand and Australia tour, so I’m not sure if she’s doing another one this year. But they’ve been so much fun in the last few weeks.

summary: David Tennant went to Harry Potter world with his kids and forgot he was Barty Crouch Jr and that some kids must've been...
body: David Tennant went to Harry Potter world with his kids and forgot he was Barty Crouch Jr and that some kids must’ve been terrified of him the whole time. Like, he literally didn’t think of that.

summary: @draco9236 -- I know it seemed like this would never be done, but it is!  Thank you so so sooooooo much for being such a patient...
caption: @draco9236 – I know it seemed like this would never be done, but it is!  Thank you so so sooooooo much for being such a patient person for this painting.  As you know, it was very challenging, and I ran into a few roadblocks with it, not to mention all the life stuff that took me away from it.  Anyway, I really hope you like it.  <3

title: My Fandom Timeline
body:
Doctor Who since 2010

Harry Potter since 2012

MARVEL since 2012

Once Upon A Time since 2012

Percy Jackson since 2013

Maze Runner since 2016

Hunger Games since 2016

The Vampire Diaries since 2017

Arrowverse since 2017

Teen Wolf since 2017

Supernatural since 2018

Disney (unknown date)

These are my main fandoms although I have my preferences. If you have any fandom recommendations, feel free to contact me.

blog.description: Photos of Scotland by David Rankin

title: Mary Queen of Scots tours
body:
Mary Queen of Scots tours

Linlithgow Palace is where Mary was born in 1542.

Next to the Palace is the medieval St Michael’s Parish Church (subject to restricted opening hours) where Mary was baptised ,  beautiful new bronze statue of Mary.

Stirling Castle where Mary herself was brought to be crowned as an infant. This was her home until she was 5 yrs old. Visit the beautifully restored Royal Apartments, where you will…

View On WordPress
